text: Don't worry Craig, I might just be tired but i'm thinking i'm a bit of a hopeless case. Hard to keep my spirits up with the uncertainty of ever getting job. My age is the problem I think. It just takes soo long to get a reel looking right doesn't it. Just to keep my mind active I think I might do an online computer science degree as a second degree. At least it will keep me thinking. I'll probably never pay back the loan though.

I was thinking about your delay question - not sure what situation you’re using this in but if its in a solver you can make an age increasing per frame so like i think you’d need to set an attribute to mark a point ready to kill and what frame it was set, then you can compare that to the frame you’re on to know if it should be “kill_red”. I think this sounds more complicated than it is i can probably make an example? Haha
I feel for you, it does take a lot - but you only need a chance and once you get going companies always need extra hands. Its just getting over that hump!
